title: Looking for players who wants to be stupid in norms.

replies.body: How stupid are we going to be if i join you? Ill be happy to join you, i don't flame much at all.

WE ALL CAN BE STUPID PICK RANDOM AS CHAMPS AND GO IN. XD.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I've sent a friend request, accept it and we can start playing.

ok, but I have to wait until the internet fixes itself cause its really slow. 

I'll send you a message after the internet turns on, ok?
I imagine off meta picks, going full ham, cheese strats, everyone shows up ganks etc
